Delivery Information Shipping Timelines Same-day delivery orders are processed and sent out immediately. All other orders are processed within 24 - 72 hours after order confirmation. Orders placed on weekends or holidays will be processed the next working day Important notes on shipping and tracking info We offer same-day shipments in Lagos only. Cut-off time is 3PM for items to ship same-day, else they ship next-day. Delivery within Lagos takes 1 working day after it's shipped out. All shipments outside Lagos are done via express or standard shipping. Shipping rates and shipping timelines vary depending on the destination and are calculated at checkout. Express shipping outside Lagos takes 2 - 4 working days. While standard shipping outside Lagos takes 4 - 7 working days. International delivery takes 5 - 7 working days. Please note that shipping windows do not include the processing time. Express shipping orders receive a tracking code immediately after they are shipped. Lagos shipments and Standard shipping orders may not have a tracking code. Have questions? Contact support@regirlworld.com or message us on WhatsApp . Proceed to checkout
